segments.text: Mary , today a man from an intermediary gave me a call .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He said he saw my job-seeking information on the Internet , and could offer me an appropriate job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of intermediary is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a recruiting agency which specializes in introducing talented people to companies and businesses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What job did he recommend to you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does he ask you to pay some fees ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , he said the employers will pay for it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then what do you think about it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel it is OK and I want to give it a try .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , but you must verify that first and don't easily make a promise .
segments.speaker: S2
